GLOBAL.BETA_WARNING: Ĉi tiu retpaĝo estas sub aktiva ellaboro kaj ĉio povas ŝanĝiĝi. Ni ne povas certigi la sekurecon kaj privatecon de via enigitaj datenoj (sed ni klopodas tiel bone kiel eble)

VALIDATION.MAXLENGTH: Too long, please use less than {max} characters.
VALIDATION.UNIQUE: Name already exists, please choose another.

GROUP.LEAVE_TEXT: Ĉu vi vere volas eliri la grupon?
GROUP.NONMEMBER_REDIRECT: You are not a member of this group.
GROUP.TITLE: Titolo de ĉi tiu grupo
GROUP.PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: Teksto videbla antaŭ aliĝi al la grupo
GROUP.PASSWORD: Entajpi pasvorton ĉi tien se vi volas privatigi la grupon
GROUP.INVITED_LIST: Invitations have already been sent out to these e-mail addresses:
GROUP.ALREADY_INVITED: An invitation has already been sent to this e-mail address
GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_SUCCESS: Welcome! You successfully accepted the invitation.
GROUP.INVITATION_ACCEPT_ERROR: Ooops, could not accept the invitation!

STOREEDIT.NAME: Nomo
STOREEDIT.WEEKS_IN_ADVANCE: Antaŭ kiom da semajnoj devus esti montritaj periodaj forkolektaj rendevuojn?

PICKUPDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: Do you really want to delete this recurring pickup date? This will also delete all one-time pickup dates that belong to this recurring pickup date (except where people joined already).

JOINGROUP.WHICHGROUP: Al kiu grupo vi volas aliĝi?
JOINGROUP.NO_PUBLIC_DESCRIPTION: (Ĉi tiu grupo havas neniun priskribo… ankoraŭ)
JOINGROUP.SIGNUP_OR_LOGIN: Log in or sign up to join this group!

LOGOUT_MESSAGE.LOG_IN: Log in to see your groups!

JOINGROUP.PROFILE_NOTE: By joining this group, your profile data will become visible to other group members.

GROUPINFO.MEMBER_VIEW: You are member of this group. Click here to switch to full view.

VERIFYMAIL.TITLE: E-Mail verification
VERIFYMAIL.SUCCESS: Your e-mail address was successfully verified!

CREATEPICKUP.WEEKDAYS_HELPER: On which days should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.TIME_HELPER: When should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.DATE_HELPER: When should the pick-up take place?
CREATEPICKUP.MAX_COLLECTORS_HELPER: How many people should participate in the pick-up?
CREATEPICKUP.COMMENT_HELPER: What should people know when signing up to this pick-up?
CREATEPICKUP.DELETION_FORBIDDEN_HELPER: This pick-up can't be deleted because people already signed up for it

PICKUPLIST.AVAILABLE: There is one pickup in the next days waiting for you! | There are {count} pickups in the next days waiting for you!
PICKUPLIST.JOINEDNOTICE: You have one upcoming pickup | You have {count} upcoming pickups

ITEM.JOIN_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you have time to pick up on {date}?
ITEM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you really sure the others can do the pickup without you?

PICKUPLIST.NONE_HINT: Vi povas krei novan forkolekton en la vendeja paĝo.

PICKUP_FEEDBACK.SUBTITLE: You can provide feedback for your pickup here
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT: Amount of food you took home (in kg)
PICKUP_FEEDBACK.COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER: Was everything fine? Did everyone show up? Your comment here...

PASSWORDRESET.TITLE: Pasvorta restarigo
PASSWORDRESET.INTRO: Entajpu vian retadreson kaj ni sendos novan pasvorton al vi (se vi jam registriĝis)
PASSWORDRESET.SUCCESS: La peto sukcese sendiĝis. Kontrolu vian retposton!

HISTORY.GROUP_MODIFY: changed the settings of this group
HISTORY.PICKUP_MODIFY: changed the settings of a pick-up
HISTORY.SERIES_MODIFY: changed the settings of a recurring pick-up
HISTORY.PICKUP_JOIN: signed up to do a pick-up at {storeName}
HISTORY.PICKUP_LEAVE: stepped back from doing a pick-up at {storeName}

NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications
NOTIFICATIONS.VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT: We sent you another verification mail. Please check your inbox.

NOT_FOUND.EXPLANATION: Sorry, we couldn't find this page anywhere.

AGREEMENT.TITLE: Title
AGREEMENT.TITLE_HELPER: Give your agreement a title, e.g. Community Rules
AGREEMENT.MINOR_EDIT_HELPER: Typos, formatting, etc... people will not be asked to re-agree
AGREEMENT.BLURB1: You don't have an agreement yet!
AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can do pickups.

REPLACE.TITLE: Change agreement?
REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for pickups

REMOVE.TITLE: Remove agreement?
REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do a pickup
